dc_title_s: Crops, HAZUS, San Mateo County Sea Level Rise Vulnerability Assessment Project Area, 2015
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains the HAZUS flood model for crops in San Mateo County, California, Hazus is the Federal Emergency Management Agencyâ€™s (FEMA) methodology for estimating potential losses from hazards. Source: California Department of Water Resources. This layer is part of the San Mateo County Sea Level Rise Vulnerability Assessment Project. These data are intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production.
dc_publisher_s: County of San Mateo Information Services Department
dc_creator_sm: County of San Mateo Information Services Department
